MarkdownBlockBase.ItemValue:
<properties pageTitle="8c697e0e-ccd8-4c7a-b200-8b9af92f4025" description="06488881-b8da-419d-bdfc-1857be071f19" services="virtual-machines" documentationCenter="" authors="bureado" manager="timlt" editor=""/>
<tags ms.service="virtual-machines" ms.workload="infrastructure-services" ms.tgt_pltfrm="vm-linux" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="04/14/2015" ms.author="jparrel"/>

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: sudo apt-get install corosync pacemaker drbd8-utils.
sudo drbdadm -c /etc/drbd.conf role r0 sudo drbdadm up r0
sudo drbdadm primary --force r0
mkfs.ext3 /dev/drbd1
sudo mkdir /var/lib/mysql sudo mount /dev/drbd1 /var/lib/mysql
sudo apt-get install mysql-server
sudo apt-get install mysql-server sudo service mysql stop sudo rm –rf /var/lib/mysql/*
sudo drbdadm secondary –force r0
sudo drbdadm primary –force r0 sudo apt-get install mysql-server
mysql azureha –u root –h hadb.cloudapp.net –e "select * from things;"
service mysql stop && umount /var/lib/mysql ; drbdadm secondary r0
drbdadm primary r0 ; mount /dev/drbd1 /var/lib/mysql && service mysql start
sudo service start corosync
sudo corosync-quorumtool –l
node $id="1" hadb01 attributes standby="off" node $id="2" hadb02 attributes standby="off"

primitive drbd_mysql ocf:linbit:drbd \ params drbd_resource="r0" \ op monitor interval="29s" role="Master" \ op monitor interval="31s" role="Slave"
ms ms_drbd_mysql drbd_mysql \ meta master-max="1" master-node-max="1" \ clone-max="2" clone-node-max="1" \ notify="true"
primitive fs_mysql ocf:heartbeat:Filesystem \ params device="/dev/drbd/by-res/r0" \ directory="/var/lib/mysql" fstype="ext3"
primitive mysqld lsb:mysql
group mysql fs_mysql mysqld
colocation mysql_on_drbd \ inf: mysql ms_drbd_mysql:Master
order mysql_after_drbd \ inf: ms_drbd_mysql:promote mysql:start
property stonith-enabled=false
property no-quorum-policy=ignore
sudo crm configure load update /tmp/cluster.conf commit exit
sudo update-rc.d pacemaker defaults
primitive st-azure stonith:external/azure \ params hostlist="hadb01 hadb02" \ clone fencing st-azure \ property stonith-enabled=true \ commit
